uniqueWeapon.name: Roar of Raging Heat, Tersia
effect: Each attack on an enemy inflicted with Eternal Blaze increases own ATK and DEF by 1%, and DMG dealt from Eternal Blaze by 1%. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times.
Each attack on an enemy inflicted with Eternal Blaze increases own ATK and DEF by 1.2%, and DMG dealt from Eternal Blaze by 1.2%. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times.
Each attack on an enemy inflicted with Eternal Blaze increases own ATK and DEF by 1.4%, and DMG dealt from Eternal Blaze by 1.4%. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times.
Each attack on an enemy inflicted with Eternal Blaze increases own ATK and DEF by 1.7%, and DMG dealt from Eternal Blaze by 1.7%. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times.
Each attack on an enemy inflicted with Eternal Blaze increases own ATK and DEF by 2.1%, and DMG dealt from Eternal Blaze by 2.1%. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times.
Each attack on an enemy inflicted with Eternal Blaze increases own ATK and DEF by 2.5%, and DMG dealt from Eternal Blaze by 2.5%. This effect can be stacked up to max 20 times.
